alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 16 at 12:18PM MST until November 16 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rapid City area, the Custer County Plains, the Pennington County Plains, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills
